cast.name: 蕾拉·阿伯西兹 Leila Abashidze

writer.name: 蕾拉·阿伯西兹 Leila Abashidze

director.name: 蕾拉·阿伯西兹 Leila Abashidze

trans_title: 第比利斯-巴黎-第比利斯
introduction: 本片是格鲁吉亚功勋女演员Leila Abashidze集编导演于一身的唯一一部作品.http://www.geocinema.ge/en/index.php?filmi=343A surreal trip about a strange georgian woman going to Paris. It's a little bit fantastic, funny but still warmly cutie movie.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leila_AbashidzeFirst and only project for Leila Abashidze as a director. Leila Abashidze was born Leila Mikhailovna Abashidze on Thursday, August 1st, 1929. Her zodiac sign is Leo, and in Chinese astrology, her sign is that of the Snake. As an actress, Leila Abashidze has performed in movies such as "Sad aris sheni bedniereba Mzia?", released in 1959, in which she portrayed Mzia, "Abezara"(1956), and "Molodini"(1969). She is the writer of "Anticipation" (1970), "Silence of Towers" (1978). She is also director, writer and the leading actress of "Tbilisi - Parisi - Tbilisi" (1980). Member of cinematographer's union sice 1958.
chinese_title: 第比利斯-巴黎-第比利斯
